activities: Trifecta Clinical (Trifecta Multimedia, LLC DBA Trifecta Clinical) provides online training and communication tools to physicians conducting clinical trials on behalf of pharmaceutical companies. Trifecta collects minimal personal information for these physicians and their support staff (name, email, place of work).  Trifecta does not collect any sensitive personal information or any patient information whatsoever.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Physicians and their support staff conducting clinical trials must prove they are qualified to conduct the trial by taking online training or submitting evidence thereof.  This requires the collection of their name, email, and place of work provided both electronically and via hard copy.
recoursemech: Trifecta Clinical has agreed to participate in the dispute resolution procedures of the panels established by the European data protection authorities (EU DPAs) and the Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner of Switzerland (FDPIC) to resolve disputes pursuant to the Safe Harbor Principles.
